## MarkerTechniqueParams.hAlignment property

Text position regarding the baseline.

 The \[\[placements\]\] attribute may override the alignment settings.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
hAlignment?: DynamicProperty<"Left" | "Center" | "Right">;
```
